item.title: Pixel 3 Wi-Fi drops constantly
item.description: We have two Google Pixel phones in our house: a Pixel 2 and a Pixel 3.

item.title: Review: JayBird BlueBuds X Sport Bluetooth Headphones
item.description: As I try to motivate myself to exercise more often, I’ve struggled to find suitable headphones for running and other outdoor work.

item.title: Two months with Google Play Music All Access
item.description: After using Spotify for a couple of months, I decided to try Google Play Music All Access.

item.title: Log Android events remotely to a syslog server
item.description: I’m still quite pleased with my Samsung Galaxy SIII but there are some finicky Bluetooth issues with my car that I simply can’t figure out.

item.title: One week with Android
item.description: After getting Android-envy at LinuxCon, I decided to push myself out of my comfort zone and ditch my iPhone 4 for a Samsung Galaxy S III.
